		- Authority(admin.authority).getNavVerifier() (../..0x876b9ebd725d1fa0b879fcee12560a6453b51dc8.sol#1136-1137)

	- data.buyPrice = _newBuyPrice (../..0x876b9ebd725d1fa0b879fcee12560a6453b51dc8.sol#664)
